GOD.content: God as the name of the possibility of keeping a secret that is visible from the interior but not from the exterior, a witness others cannot see, other than me, more intimate with me than myself, structure of invisible interiority, God calls me, I call myself God
GOD.linkedContent: God as the name of the possibility of keeping a secret that is visible from the interior but not from the exterior, a witness others cannot see, other than me, more intimate with me than myself, structure of invisible interiority, God calls me, I call myself God

GOD.content: secret letter becomes literature [Kafka] when it risks publicity, destinerrance, an archive to be inherited, when abandoned to its undecidability (is it the signature of father or son?)
GOD.linkedContent: secret letter becomes literature [Kafka] when it risks publicity, destinerrance, an archive to be inherited, when abandoned to its undecidability (is it the signature of father or son?)

GOD.content: w/ no witness, can only come down to us in the trace of an inheritance
GOD.linkedContent: w/ no witness, can only come down to us in the trace of an inheritance

GT.content: Derrida not too convinced by those who defend anti-Semitism of Celine, Baudelaire; exterminate all the witnesses? there’s no anti-Semitism in that?
GT.linkedContent: Derrida not too convinced by those who defend anti-Semitism of Celine, Baudelaire; exterminate all the witnesses? there’s no anti-Semitism in that?

FK.content: oath, sworn faith (foi jurée), pledge to God as witness: creates the unproducible, cannot not produce God as already there [déjà]
FK.linkedContent: oath, sworn faith (foi jurée), pledge to God as witness: creates the unproducible, cannot not produce God as already there [déjà]

AF.content: Yerushalmi doesn’t treat Freud as a witness in the 3rd person (terstis), but as a 2nd person “called to witness” (incompatible w/ classical scientific discourse, history, philology)
AF.linkedContent: Yerushalmi doesn’t treat Freud as a witness in the 3rd person (terstis), but as a 2nd person “called to witness” (incompatible w/ classical scientific discourse, history, philology)

A.content: Heidegger, Freud, Levinas remarkable witnesses to questioning induced by presuppositions of anthropo-thanatology
A.linkedContent: Heidegger, Freud, Levinas remarkable witnesses to questioning induced by presuppositions of anthropo-thanatology

A.content: [consider existential analysis as a witness] belonging w/out belonging condition of testimony, and of its language first of all
A.linkedContent: [consider existential analysis as a witness] belonging w/out belonging condition of testimony, and of its language first of all

POOF.content: how can you be together to bear witness to secrecy, singularity, separation: testify where testimony is impossible (Blanchot)
POOF.linkedContent: how can you be together to bear witness to secrecy, singularity, separation: testify where testimony is impossible (Blanchot)

POOF.content: via Deguy, Aristotle overtook to ruin the capital letters of Platonism, the eídos of friendship, by calling the witness to the stand, an “actual” friend > Derrida will take sign of this ruin & no longer answer call to witness stand
POOF.linkedContent: via Deguy, Aristotle overtook to ruin the capital letters of Platonism, the eídos of friendship, by calling the witness to the stand, an “actual” friend > Derrida will take sign of this ruin & no longer answer call to witness stand

TC.content: Nietzsche: Dionysian excitement has no listener, if he did, would be torn to pieces by Maenads [theater of cruelty: speech w/out listeners, spectacle w/out spectators]
TC.linkedContent: Nietzsche: Dionysian excitement has no listener, if he did, would be torn to pieces by Maenads [theater of cruelty: speech w/out listeners, spectacle w/out spectators]

SH.content: witnessing codes, disguises of poem at once essential & inessential [re: Szondi as intimate witness of one of Celan’s poems, he knew Celan passed through Berlin at this date], poem would speak to us nonetheless, beyond its dated singularity
SH.linkedContent: witnessing codes, disguises of poem at once essential & inessential [re: Szondi as intimate witness of one of Celan’s poems, he knew Celan passed through Berlin at this date], poem would speak to us nonetheless, beyond its dated singularity

SH.content: poem—destined to remain alone > date is a witness, but one can bless date w/out knowing to “what” or for “whom” one bears witness, always possible there’ll no longer be a witness for this witness: affinity btwn date, name, ash
SH.linkedContent: poem—destined to remain alone > date is a witness, but one can bless date w/out knowing to “what” or for “whom” one bears witness, always possible there’ll no longer be a witness for this witness: affinity btwn date, name, ash

SH.content: Jew as poet, as “he” w/ unpronounceable name, as witness to the universal through absolute singularity, by virtue of and in name of the other
SH.linkedContent: Jew as poet, as “he” w/ unpronounceable name, as witness to the universal through absolute singularity, by virtue of and in name of the other

F.content: forums are politico-juridical instances, require a third, a witness (like a duel), tribunal instruisant un procès, mettant en cause
F.linkedContent: forums are politico-juridical instances, require a third, a witness (like a duel), tribunal instruisant un procès, mettant en cause

F.content: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum
F.linkedContent: le tiers incorporé est gardé pour être supprimé [held in to be crossed out]: assembly of witnesses around Wolf Man’s crypt (forum): whole strategy of testifying > on s’y coupe tout le temps, witnesses testify by interrupting, wounded by angular edges of forum

DS.content: truth of the book is decidable, the book w/in the soul can be true, psychic writing must appear before tribunal of ontology & dialectics [re: Plato]
DS.linkedContent: truth of the book is decidable, the book w/in the soul can be true, psychic writing must appear before tribunal of ontology & dialectics [re: Plato]

ROP.content: can there be a witness to madness, a third that provides reason w/out objectifying? w/out examining (arraisonner)? [Nietzsche’s no accusation, GS 276] témoigner, est-ce voir? est-ce rendre raison?
ROP.linkedContent: can there be a witness to madness, a third that provides reason w/out objectifying? w/out examining (arraisonner)? [Nietzsche’s no accusation, GS 276] témoigner, est-ce voir? est-ce rendre raison?

ATIA.content: Derrida sometimes sees Nietzsche take the horse’s head in his hands, calls it as a witness to his compassion
ATIA.linkedContent: Derrida sometimes sees Nietzsche take the horse’s head in his hands, calls it as a witness to his compassion

ATIA.content: some animal will cock its ears when someone [Descartes] invokes infinity of experiences that “witness to,” w/out feeling need to “review” [animal Derrida? animal Nietzsche?]
ATIA.linkedContent: some animal will cock its ears when someone [Descartes] invokes infinity of experiences that “witness to,” w/out feeling need to “review” [animal Derrida? animal Nietzsche?]

ATIA.content: Levinas’ Bobby dog is a witness for us, an other w/out alterity: recalls the subject to being subject > this is not sufficient deconstruction of Cartesian man/animal borderline
ATIA.linkedContent: Levinas’ Bobby dog is a witness for us, an other w/out alterity: recalls the subject to being subject > this is not sufficient deconstruction of Cartesian man/animal borderline

PS.content: to protect meaning of thought (value of work) against psychomedical reduction, criticism (aesthetic, literary, philosophical) must create an example, a case [from opposite path, produces same reduction it’s trying to avoid]
PS.linkedContent: to protect meaning of thought (value of work) against psychomedical reduction, criticism (aesthetic, literary, philosophical) must create an example, a case [from opposite path, produces same reduction it’s trying to avoid]

PS.content: the work, the example, becomes martyr, bearing witness to structure whose essential permanence is prime preoccupation of commentary > criticism reads essence into example
PS.linkedContent: the work, the example, becomes martyr, bearing witness to structure whose essential permanence is prime preoccupation of commentary > criticism reads essence into example

FS.content: God imprints secondarity on every navigation of the human: 1) passage of deferred reciprocity btwn reading & writing? 2) absolute witness who’s already read what you will write: third party as transparency of meaning? [circular logos]
FS.linkedContent: God imprints secondarity on every navigation of the human: 1) passage of deferred reciprocity btwn reading & writing? 2) absolute witness who’s already read what you will write: third party as transparency of meaning? [circular logos]

DPi.content: stage lighting of DP, light of fire, never is sovereign more visible than when it makes itself voyante et voyeuse of execution > sovereign witnesses crime, witnesses itself, eye witness
DPi.linkedContent: stage lighting of DP, light of fire, never is sovereign more visible than when it makes itself voyante et voyeuse of execution > sovereign witnesses crime, witnesses itself, eye witness

HLP.content: history of lie, that of false witness, of perjury
HLP.linkedContent: history of lie, that of false witness, of perjury

PJP.content: anacoluthic catastrophe finds one of its privileged places in fold where the guilty accuses the witness, makes him bear responsibility for the offense
PJP.linkedContent: anacoluthic catastrophe finds one of its privileged places in fold where the guilty accuses the witness, makes him bear responsibility for the offense

HST.content: Celan: “no one is a witness for the witness”
HST.linkedContent: Celan: “no one is a witness for the witness”

ATM.content: the grammatical utterance [“here I am”?] is there, but put out of joint (disloqué), making room (that is not a home) for an agrammaticality of the gift assigned from the other (depuis l’autre)
ATM.linkedContent: the grammatical utterance [“here I am”?] is there, but put out of joint (disloqué), making room (that is not a home) for an agrammaticality of the gift assigned from the other (depuis l’autre)

ATM.content: incorporating what it can’t assimilate, quoting the uncitable consists in accusing language [appearing as witness & accused], (sur)rendered (offerre) to a gift, as a gift which language can’t open up to on its own
ATM.linkedContent: incorporating what it can’t assimilate, quoting the uncitable consists in accusing language [appearing as witness & accused], (sur)rendered (offerre) to a gift, as a gift which language can’t open up to on its own

AD.content: Levinas compares his illeity to unimpeachable witness in Descartes’ 3rd Meditation
AD.linkedContent: Levinas compares his illeity to unimpeachable witness in Descartes’ 3rd Meditation

BSi.content: [vis-à-vis Marin] autopsia: seeing w/ one’s own eyes, bear witness to authentic past event, narrator a “witness,” “martyr”
BSi.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Marin] autopsia: seeing w/ one’s own eyes, bear witness to authentic past event, narrator a “witness,” “martyr”

ATAP.content: general narrator at moment of signature calls itself the witness (martyrōn, testimonium)
ATAP.linkedContent: general narrator at moment of signature calls itself the witness (martyrōn, testimonium)

CIR.content: intolerable foreclosure when I write: the already known, loved, that can’t be quoted; gather myself in circle of cum, circus of circum, before the constituting witness I’m always fleeing
CIR.linkedContent: intolerable foreclosure when I write: the already known, loved, that can’t be quoted; gather myself in circle of cum, circus of circum, before the constituting witness I’m always fleeing

CIR.content: hoping, sighing, demanding, invoking, promising that the witness will attest that you will never have had any witness, you alone, whose life will have been so short, you the crossing btwn 2 phantoms of witnesses who will never come down to the same
CIR.linkedContent: hoping, sighing, demanding, invoking, promising that the witness will attest that you will never have had any witness, you alone, whose life will have been so short, you the crossing btwn 2 phantoms of witnesses who will never come down to the same

SPEC.content: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution
SPEC.linkedContent: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution

SPEC.content: race to death, exhausts couriers, witnesses, relays, from post to post
SPEC.linkedContent: race to death, exhausts couriers, witnesses, relays, from post to post
